overview: Bon Jovi at Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on September 22, 2017. Setlist: This House Is Not for Sale / Raise Your Hands / Knockout / You Give Love a Bad Name / Born to Be My Baby / Lost Highway / Because We Can / I'll Sleep When I'm Dead / Runaway / We Got It Goin' On / Someday I'll Be Saturday Night (Acoustic) / Bed of Roses / It's My Life / Captain Crash & the Beauty Queen From Mars / Roller Coaster / Wanted Dead or Alive / Lay Your Hands on Me / Keep the Faith / Bad Medicine / Have a Nice Day / Livin' on a Prayer
title: Bon Jovi: Rock in Rio 2017
